OTL 4.0, Examples for TimesTen / ODBC

The examples below demontrate how to use OTL with TimesTen via ODBC, the native API for TimesTen.
  1. Example 293 (Simple Insert/Select/Update)
  2. Example 294 ("Incompatible datatypes in stream operation" exception)
  3. Example 295 (otl_datetime container and DATE/TIME/TIMESTAMP  table columns)
  4. Example 296 (std::string and STL-compliant stream iterators)
  5. Example 297 (otl_stream::describe_select() with a simple Select)
  6. Example 298 (otl_stream and NULLs)
  7. Example 299 (OTL_ADD_NULL_TERMINATOR_STRING_SIZE)
